Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Yithi kwizicaka zaM mazithethe awona mazwi alungileyo (ngokuba) uShaytân inene, uhlwayele imeko yempixano nokungavumelani phakathi kwabo. Inene, uShaytân emntwini ulutshaba olucacileyo
INkosi yenu Inazi kakuhle; ukuba Ithandile Iya kuba nenceba kuni, okanye ukuba Ithandile, Inohlwaye. Yaye aSikuthumelanga ukuba ube ngumlondolozi wabo wena (Muhammad)
Kananjalo iNkosi yakho Ibazi ngcono bonke abasezulwini nasemhlabeni. Yaye inene, Siye Sakhetha abanye abaProfeti kunabanye. UDâwûd Samnika iZabûr (iNcwadi yendumiso kaDavide)
Yithi (Muhammad): “Bizani kaloku kwabo bangaphandle kwaKhe enibenza ngathi (ngoothixo). Bona abanawo amandla okususa ububi kuni bengekhe babushenxise nokubushenxisa kuni babuse komnye umntu
Abo babiza kubo kwabona buqu bathembele eNkosini yakho, yaye boyika isohlwayo saYo. Inene, isohlwayo seNkosi yakho siyoyikeka
Kananjalo akukho dolophu eSingayi kuyitshabalalisa phambi kweMini yoVuko, okanye Siyohlwaye ngesohlwayo esibuhlungu. Oko kubhaliwe eNcwadini

Kwaye akukho nto iSithintelayo ukuba Singathumeli umqondiso kodwa abantu bamandulo bayiphikisa (imiqondiso leyo). Sathumela imazi yenkamela kwaThamûd ukuba ibe ngumqondiso ocacileyo (kubo), kodwa bayenza ububi. Kananjalo aSizanga Sithumele mqondiso Singawuthumeleli ukubalumkisa nokubenza boyike (intshabalalo)

Yabona! Sakuxelela (okokuba) “Inene iNkosi yakho Ibarhangqele abantu.” Kananjalo aSiwenzelanga nto yimbi umbono (wohambo lwakho ngobusuku oluya emazulwini) koko (Siwenzele ukuba) ube luvavanyo loluntu, nomthi weZa’kkûn, okhankanywe) kwi’Kur’ân. Siyabalumkisa Siboyikise kodwa akukho nto kubongezelela yona (oko) ngaphandle kobuhedeni, ingcinezelo nokungathobeli uAllâh
